articles.title: LTIMindtree Won’t Be As Profitable As Expected In Fiscal 2024, CEO Says - NDTV Profit
articles.description: LTIMindtree had aimed to deliver an operational profitability of 17-18% in FY24. That’s not happening now due to higher-than-expected furloughs and sluggish conversion of deals into revenue.
articles.content: LTIMindtree Ltd. wont be as profitable as promised in the ongoing fiscal as furloughs ate into margins and deal conversion remained sluggish, according to chief executive officer Debashis Chatterjee.… [+1225 chars]
